component.name: rclone-tui
component.summary: A TUI based manager for rclone

description.p: rclone-tui is a cross-platform manager for rclone. It aims to be on-par with the web GUI as well as provide more improvements and enhancements over its general functionality.

Its features currently include: - Monitor rclone stats via the dashboard - Create, update, view and delete configurations - Explore remotes and perform various operations - Mount and unmount remotes - View file transfer and progress information
